localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

As the lone survivor of an Orc Invasion, Armed with a clever new weapon and a blood thirsty spirit, your goal is to slaughter your way through hordes of Orcs, clearing a path to the occupied castle and freeing the lands of the orc menace once and for all.

~~Key Features~~
~ Player upgrades
~ 4 enemy types
~ 4 different types of bolt
~ Melee weapons
~ Linear gameplay

Package size: 305 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

©Cooply Solutions Ltd

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
